Five Useful Ideas

About Blog

Welcome!

This website documents my love for simple and sustainable technologies that enable online freedom, privacy rights, and free and open access to information and knowledge.

About this site

Documenting my journey for a better web with these ideas,

  • Open-source
  • Privacy-first
  • Cross-platform
  • Eco-friendly
  • Inclusive community

You can find me on:

  • Fosstodon: @5uie1@fosstodon.org
  • XMPP: fui@jabb3r.org
  • Matrix: @5uie1:matrix.org
  • Github: 5uie@github.com
  • Sourcehut: fui@sr.ht

This site has been built to ensure low load times nad is based on the John Doe Template and is hugely inspired by 10kb Club's ideas of a quicker, simpler web.

I hope to document the minor and the major through a series of articles here.
